profileAlternative.summary: Skilled in Audio Engineering, C++, DSP, Audio Processing, SketchUp/Rhino, and Sound. Electrical Engineering background. Strong research professional with prototyping experience, and a Ph.D. in Acoustics from Penn State University.

aboutAlternative.text: Skilled in Audio Engineering, C++, DSP, Audio Processing, SketchUp/Rhino, and Sound. Electrical Engineering background. Strong research professional with prototyping experience, and a Ph.D. in Acoustics from Penn State University.

positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant, M.S. Acoustics, Ph.D. Acoustics
positions.description:
Programmed Computational Acoustics Models in C++.

The specific model for my PhD Dissertation was a time accurate combined Specular Reflection and Edge Diffraction model for outdoor applications. It was validated, applied to a Sonic Boom modeling problem, and results were compare to experimental data.
…

positions.title: Audio / Acoustic Project Lead
positions.description: Design and implementation of novel purpose-built multichannel audio systems.

positions.title: Consultant | Acoustics
positions.description:
Executed acoustic measurements, some to spec and legally binding, some designed in house to answer questions.

Programmed spatial audio demonstrations for technical communication purposes.

Communicated design ideas verbally and through technical drawings and deliverables.
…
see more

positions.title: Chief Audio Engineer
positions.description:
Cheif Audio Engineer for the Subscription Only Investment Advice Radio Station.

On call 24 hours, 5.5 days a week. Ensured stability of the system and audio quality.

Outfitted a second station on short notice in preparation for hurricane Sandy.

Provided recommendations, and applied improvements to maximize broadcast quality.

Task based projects included: tuning the processing of talents voices in Ableton Live, building custom electronics, and selection/calibration of VU meters.
